mapper.select: SELECT ei.employee_id, ei.employee_date_of_join, lr.request_id, lr.request_date, lr.start_date, lr.end_date, lr.leave_days, lr.reason, lr.status, lr.approval_comment, lr.updatable, lr.cancellable, lr.leave_type, lr.approver_id FROM employee_info ei LEFT JOIN leave_requests lr ON ei.employee_id = lr.employee_id WHERE ei.employee_id = #{employeeId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO leave_requests( employee_id, request_id, request_date, start_date, end_date, leave_days, reason, status, approval_comment, updatable, cancellable, leave_type, approver_id ) VALUES ( #{employeeId}, #{requestId}, #{requestDate}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{leaveDays}, #{reason}, #{status}, #{approvalComment}, #{updatable}, #{cancellable}, #{leaveType}, #{approverId} );
mapper.update: UPDATE leave_requests SET approver_id = #{approverId}, leave_type = #{leaveType}, request_date = #{requestDate}, start_date = #{startDate}, end_date = #{endDate}, leave_days = #{leaveDays}, reason = #{reason} WHERE request_id = #{requestId}
